trans-unit.source: Provision a web app that uses a SQL Database
trans-unit.target: Provision a web app that uses a SQL Database

trans-unit.source: Use an Azure Resource Manager template to deploy a web app that includes a SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: Use an Azure Resource Manager template to deploy a web app that includes a SQL Database.

trans-unit.source: In this topic, you will learn how to create an Azure Resource Manager template that deploys a web app and SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: In this topic, you will learn how to create an Azure Resource Manager template that deploys a web app and SQL Database.

trans-unit.source: You will learn how to define which resources are deployed and how to define parameters that are specified when the deployment is executed.
trans-unit.target: You will learn how to define which resources are deployed and how to define parameters that are specified when the deployment is executed.

trans-unit.source: You can use this template for your own deployments, or customize it to meet your requirements.
trans-unit.target: You can use this template for your own deployments, or customize it to meet your requirements.

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating templates, see <linkText>Authoring Azure Resource Manager Templates</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about creating templates, see <linkText>Authoring Azure Resource Manager Templates</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about deploying apps, see <linkText>Deploy a complex application predictably in Azure</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about deploying apps, see <linkText>Deploy a complex application predictably in Azure</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: For the complete template, see <linkText>Web App With SQL Database template</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For the complete template, see <linkText>Web App With SQL Database template</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: In this template, you will deploy:
trans-unit.target: In this template, you will deploy:

trans-unit.source: a web app
trans-unit.target: a web app

trans-unit.source: SQL Database server
trans-unit.target: SQL Database server

trans-unit.source: SQL Database
trans-unit.target: SQL Database

trans-unit.source: AutoScale settings
trans-unit.target: AutoScale settings

trans-unit.source: Alert rules
trans-unit.target: Alert rules

trans-unit.source: App Insights
trans-unit.target: App Insights

trans-unit.source: To run the deployment automatically, click the following button:
trans-unit.target: To run the deployment automatically, click the following button:

trans-unit.source: [<linkText>Deploy to Azure</linkText>](https://portal.azure.com/#create/Microsoft.Template/uri/https%3A%2F%2Fraw.githubusercontent.com%2FAzure%2Fazure-quickstart-templates%2Fmaster%2F201-web-app-sql-database%2Fazuredeploy.json)
trans-unit.target: [<linkText>Deploy to Azure</linkText>](https://portal.azure.com/#create/Microsoft.Template/uri/https%3A%2F%2Fraw.githubusercontent.com%2FAzure%2Fazure-quickstart-templates%2Fmaster%2F201-web-app-sql-database%2Fazuredeploy.json)

trans-unit.source: The name of the new database server to create.
trans-unit.target: The name of the new database server to create.

trans-unit.source: The location of the database server.
trans-unit.target: The location of the database server.

trans-unit.source: For best performance, this location should be the same as the location of the web app.
trans-unit.target: For best performance, this location should be the same as the location of the web app.

trans-unit.source: The account name to use for the database server administrator.
trans-unit.target: The account name to use for the database server administrator.

trans-unit.source: The password to use for the database server administrator.
trans-unit.target: The password to use for the database server administrator.

trans-unit.source: The name of the new database to create.
trans-unit.target: The name of the new database to create.

trans-unit.source: The database collation to use for governing the proper use of characters.
trans-unit.target: The database collation to use for governing the proper use of characters.

trans-unit.source: The type of database to create.
trans-unit.target: The type of database to create.

trans-unit.source: The maximum size, in bytes, for the database.
trans-unit.target: The maximum size, in bytes, for the database.

trans-unit.source: The name corresponding to the performance level for edition.
trans-unit.target: The name corresponding to the performance level for edition.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new SQL Server and database.
trans-unit.target: Creates a new SQL Server and database.

trans-unit.source: The name of the server is specified in the serverName parameter and the location specified in the serverLocation parameter.
trans-unit.target: The name of the server is specified in the serverName parameter and the location specified in the serverLocation parameter.

trans-unit.source: When creating the new server, you must provide a login name and password for the database server administrator.
trans-unit.target: When creating the new server, you must provide a login name and password for the database server administrator.
